text: Ippolito "Ito" Giani (8 September 1941 â€“ 28 September 2018) was an Italian sprinter. He was born in Varese, Italy. From 1963 to 1967 he took part in 20 international competitions and won six medals. He was in the 1964 Summer Olympics.Ito Giani . sports-reference.com Giani died in Varese on 28 September 2018 at the age of 77.L'ultimo saluto ad Ito Giani ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Italian sprinters Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy Category:People from Varese
title: Ito Giani
